messages.content: hey jon, got any tips for a newbie dm? wanna make sure my first campaign is a hit!

oh man, yeah for sure! first thing, don’t stress too much about getting all the rules perfect haha. it's more about having fun and telling a cool story together. make sure ur players are into the story, that's big 😄 **user:** makes sense! how do you keep everyone engaged though? **jon:** i like to throw in surprises now and then, keeps things interesting. and always try to give each player a moment to shine, you know? like tailor parts of the story to their characters' backgrounds and skills. **user:** got it. do you ever worry about players not enjoying the campaign? **jon:** yeah sometimes, i start thinking if they don’t like it maybe they won’t wanna hang out anymore... and then i start worrying they're just showing up to be nice. it’s silly, i know. sometimes i get stuck in my head, thinking they might all secretly be having a bad time and jsut not saying anything. it's this whole spiral, haha... 😅 **user:** i’m sure they’re having fun, man. you seem like a great dm! **jon:** thanks, dude, i appreciate that. i guess im just used to overthinking stuff. gotta remind myself it's all about having a good time together, right? gonna keep working on that confidence part, haha. one session at a time! 🎲🐉
